body.name: TECURS USB Microphone, Condenser Microphone Kit for Computer, Podcast Mic Set, PC Condenser Mic with Boom Arm for Gaming,Streaming,YouTube,Recording,Chatting
features: ♪【Professional Sound Quality】 With its built-in sound chipset, Cardioid Pickup Pattern, 192KHz/24Bit high Sampling Rate, and 30Hz-20KHz wide Frequency Response, the Gaming USB condenser microphone is easily able to capture clear and smooth sound and perform perfectly in reproducing your sound.
♪【One-Touch Mute】 Its One-Touch Mute design means you only need to touch one button of the USB microphone to mute at any time. When the red LED lights up, it indicates that your microphone is in use.

♪【Gain Knob & Earphone Monitor】Equipped with a Gain Knob, you can quickly control the volume of microphone. Additionally, this PC condenser microphone has a 3.5mm Headphone Jack which could also be used to monitor your voice efficiently.

♪【POP Filter Protection】This Gaming Microphone Kit for Computer is equipped with a professional Double-Layer Acoustic Filter and a windproof Foam Cover. It is ideal to prevent bursting, as well as improve recording quality by providing you with clear and blast-free vocal performance.

♪【Unique Multiple Uses】The USB micphone set is also equipped with a tripod stand which enables you to adjust every angle and height easily to match your working position on the table. The extremely stable tripod could free your hands and allow you to enjoy live streaming or recording.

♪【Plug-and-Play & Wide Compatibility】With a USB 2.0 data port, you could easily connect the microphone with your Mac and Windows computers. And please kindly know that it is not compatible with Xbox. There is no additional driver or external sound card required. Further, the PC Microphone Kit is a great choice for podcasting, streaming, chatting, recording, meetings, dubbing, games, Zoom, MSN, Skype, YouTube videos, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB-Plug-and-Play-Microphone TECURS Microphone Built-in anti-vibration shock mount as well as professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips,providing effective identification of the original sound and clear recording in noisy environment. It’s built with a sponge windscreen to reduce wind noise and plosives.

Microphone for Gaming Monitor your voice This condenser microphone has a 3.5mm headphone jack which can also be used to effectively monitor your voice With gain knob, quickly control microphone volume Microphone for Recording Cardioid microphone, please speak in front of the microphone

Touch to mute You can easily mute your microphone by pressing the MUTE key, refuse the clicking sound. POP Filter Protection This condenser microphone kit is equipped with a professional double-layer acoustic filter to prevent bursting. Adjustable arm Support your adjustment to get the best sound, suitable for podcasting and streaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great budget setup
reviews.reviewText: The microphone is metal and durable. It’s not cheap quality like you would expect for this price range but the audio is clear and crisp and has worked great while streaming video games. This package gives you everything you need to get going.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sound mic, even better price
reviews.reviewText: I took a gamble on this mic , especial at this price mark and all accessories included. It sounds just as good as my $300 XLR MIC! I've only had it a few days, but so far I am not disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product so far
reviews.reviewText: Got in a timely fashion...seems well built and sturdy and seems to work as it should so far my daughter has no complaints and loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Este microfono es realmente increible, completamente metalico,el sonido es tal y como lo describen aqui en su pagina, es la mejor inversion que he echo en mi vida.Lo recomiendo al 100%.This microphone is truly incredible, completely metal, the sound is just as described here on their page, it is the best investment I have made in my life I recommend it 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and has worked flawlessly. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Overall good mic.
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited to get this mic in because I loved all the features located on the mic. For the most part it has worked fantastically, but after about a week of having it I have been running into some issues. Currently the issues I'm having is randomly static coming thru my headphones and also being heard thru my mic, some times this static is so bad that I have to take my headphones off from how loud it is. I first thought it my be my headphones messing up but after unplugging my headphones and plugging them back in, it still happens. It is only "fixed" when I unplug the mic and replug it in, and even then it's a temporary fix. Other than this issue the mic works great, my voice comes thru great and my ambient sounds are almost all eliminated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can Beat it for the Price.
reviews.reviewText: Sounds as good as my Blue Yetti. No issues. Comes with arm. Had it over a year and no issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A Product That Decides Which Days/Minutes It Will Work - Update
reviews.reviewText: Recently I bought a headset that didn't include a built in mic because I liked the audio quality and felt that it was time to at least give a standing microphone a spin, when I saw the value of this microphone I was thrilled to give it a try, but there was that nagging feeling that it was too good to be true.If you are in the same boat let my story be a warning for you, it appears this product has absolutely no QC, the box was in absolute shambles when I received it, the manual was thrown to the side of the box like it was an afterthought, and, although the packaging was alright, it just seemed even more off than before. But again, the price with everything that was included I thought that it would still be quite a good deal, even with all of the aforementioned nitpicks. And then I plugged it in, straight away it gave me the coveted "Microsoft cannot identify your USB device."This message is a nightmare for me as I had a headset that went bad and had the same issues with it doing this same thing, I hoped it was a fluke, and replugged it. When I did it actually identified and was letting me change the settings, fantastic! And just as quickly as that excitement came it fled, when I tested the mic the audio visualizer, for lack of a better term, was stuck at roughly the 30% mark and not moving no matter what noises I made. Okay, it's probably just a problem with my settings, I followed all of the settings of manual, all of which are just "make our device default" by the way, not a very in depth process, only to still have the same issue. Well I decided that it could possibly be the USB port that I had been using, as I had never used it before, I unplugged my, currently, working headset and plugged in the USB microphone, now not only was it not recording sound, it was once again saying it was undetectable, and that has now been the full story of this microphone, I have tried 4 more USB slots (don't ask I have a ton of USB slots on my motherboard) and a full reboot and absolutely nothing has changed, I can't even get to the point where I can get it to get detected again. And the worst part is I have no idea if a change in USB cord will even affect anything, as neither the port in the mic, or the cable end on the cable look damaged at all. So thank you Tecurs, you have been a complete waste of my time, and an absolute horrible first impression to standing mics for me, worst part is I'm sure your mic arm isn't even compatible with most other mics so I can't even write this off as just buying an extra mic arm.Okay after 20 minutes of writing this I must amend it, I tried it on my friend's PC, and it detected on his but wouldn't record audio, but then I plugged it into my PC once again, and it inexplicably worked, I have absolutely no idea why this would be the case, it was the same USB port that wasn't working, I didn't even restart my PC again, I must say this is the nature of the beast when messing with cheaper products, I guess I'm happy but I cannot imagine why it works now, I didn't even scrunch the USB in any particular way. I'll amend this with what I feel about the quality of the product after I actually am able to use it now that it is actually functioning.This is after roughly a year, the mic has been working fine, until I moved the arm one day and the entire plastic assembly in and around the mic holster (if you'll call it that) and the part that connects that to the mic arm completely collapsed under the weight of the microphone, there is no way to fix this, so just keep in mind when you buy this product that it will not even last you a full year.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great customer service and decent mic.
reviews.reviewText: I received a mic which was working but the mic red led was not working. I complained it to the seller and they asked me to send them a video/picture. I shared the a video showing the led issue. The seller sent me a replacement mic with in few days without returning the other mic. The mic is working good and it has a good bassy sound. So far I am satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: De kwaliteit viel me erg tegen en inhad het idee dat iemand anders de verpakking al een keer geopend had. Besloten niet veder te gaan en retour te sturen

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a very good mic comes with a while boom arm and a stand if you don't have space for the arm, audio quality is fantastic a lot of friends complimented my mic and I also started streaming with it very very useful and very good for the price point 10/10

Je met 3 étoiles car celui-ci m'a accompagné une bonne année dans YouTube. Le micro est en sois bon mais n'est pas excellent au niveau de la captation des graves, même si celui-ci est en cardioïde il capte les bruits ambiant ce qui est désagréable je vous l'avoue.Malheureusement, le câble USB du micro est très facile ce qui m'a fait changé.Pour ce prix là vous pouvez aller voir pour un Bird UM1 qui est excellent sur beaucoup de point.
